short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hundreds of simple user-friendly tools for computational and creative needs: colors, images, text, lists, mathematics, files, etc.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🌐 PineTools: Your Ultimate Online Toolbox - Now as a Chrome Extension! 🚀

✨ =Overview=

👋 Welcome to PineTools, the official Chrome extension of your favorite online toolkit! 🛠️🌍

PineTools brings a diverse array of practical, easy-to-use online tools directly to your browser, enhancing your productivity and creativity with just a click.

🔑 =Key Features=

🔗 Instant Access: Over hundreds of online tools. Whether you're manipulating images, crunching numbers, or coding, PineTools has you covered ✨
⚡ Lightning-Fast Search: Our instant search function ensures you find the tool you need without any delay! 🔍
💖 Personalized Experience: Favorite your frequently used tools for quicker access 🌟
🌙 Stunning Dark Mode: Experience perhaps the most elegant dark mode ever, easy on the eyes and beautifully designed 🖤
🌐 Multilingual: English and Spanish 🇬🇧🇪🇸

🔝 =Popular Categories=

🖼️ Images: From basic edits to advanced manipulations, transform your images with ease 🎨
📝 Text & Lists: Sort, merge, modify text/lists effortlessly ✒️
🖩 Mathematics: Simplify complex mathematical problems with our specialized tools ➗
🔢 Numbers: Generate, convert, calculate numbers in various formats 🔢
📅 Date & Time: Manage and manipulate dates and times with precision 🕒
🎲 Randomness: Generate random numbers, strings, images, or files 🎲
💻 Programming (Tools for developers): syntax highlighters, code inliners, and more 

🌟 =Top Tools=

🖼️ Image Editing: Split, merge, invert colors, blur, sharpen, add effects like pixelation or grayscale, and much more 🎨
📂 File Management: Corrupt files, split and join files, batch operations, and other handy utilities 💾
📜 Text Processing: Add text, find and replace, remove duplicates, count lines, sort lists, and other text manipulations ✏️
📊 Math & Numbers: Calculators, random number generators, sort numbers, and more ➕
🎨 Creative Tools: Generate QR codes, create gradients, apply filters, and unleash your creativity 🌈
🛠️ And Many More! 🔧

 -------------

Become a part of our growing community of users who have simplified their digital tasks with PineTools. Whether you're a student, professional, or hobbyist, our Chrome extension is designed to make your online experience more efficient and enjoyable. 🤝

Get the PineTools Chrome extension today and transform your browser into a powerhouse of tools and utilities! 🎉
